unnormalised: Pesticide use is a tricky business, isn't it? Remember that crop failure near Kanpur in '22? Heard my Nani in Kerala used traditional methods until 1975. Maybe look at some IARI research from 2010 on alternatives? Too much is risky. 06:00 AM spraying isn't ideal. Balance is key. What do you all think?
normalised: Pesticide use is a tricky business, isn't it? Remember that crop failure near Kanpur in two thousand and twenty two? Heard my Nani in Kerala used traditional methods until nineteen seventy five. Maybe look at some I A R I research from two thousand and ten on alternatives? Too much is risky. six A M spraying isn't ideal. Balance is key. What do you all think?
